name: Puddlepath
description:
Created in 7 days for the 2023 7DRL challenge! 

Make your way up to the top through procedurally-generated levels without drying out! 

==

I would call this "complete" as in it can be played start to finish, but there's quite a bit I didn't quite get to during the jam time ^^" I'll probably come back to do a post-jam build and add a couple of those things in! Regardless, I hope you enjoy :)
